name: Corona Quest
description:
CoronaQuest

Your quest to secure the worlds toilet paper has led you to this supermarket. Be careful, there might be something inside.

Controls
  • WASD -- Move
  • Mouse -- Aim
  • LMB -- Fire
  • RMB or 'R' -- Reload
  • Space -- Dash
  • Reset -- Esc
Crits!

You will momentarily to critical damage after reloading or dashing. These effects will stack. Time your reload and dash correctly to insta-kill enemies.
